name: Thief Robbery -Sneak Simulator
description:
Lets start your real Thief journey! Rob most secured houses in the town. Use your tool set to unlock doors and windows! Steal most expensive items (diamonds, gold, cash, laptop, phones etc) and sell them to make more cash. Avoid bulgar alarm and CCTV camera's

Do you want to play your next game on Xbox or VR? You want to watch next world cup on big LCD ? Do you to want a diamond ring for your girlfriend? Real thieves don't worry about ending. They show courage and make their wishes come true.

You are about to rob houses on Walton Street. Park your car at safe place near your target house. Pick basic tools and a beg to keep stolen items. Never make a noise or break a window. Otherwise people inside house can inform police or attack you. And don't forget to take lock braking device!

-- Features --

-> Rob secured houses
-> Rob Shops and Super Market
-> Steal and upgrade your car
-> Hacking device for electric locks
-> Lock Pin & Crowbar for break and unlocking doors, windows
-> Drive safely and don't do any suspicious activity
-> Avoid clash with police
-> Avoid fight with pedestrians and other cars
-> Don't kill home owners, just sneak and steal


Tip No. 1 - Don't collect cheap stuff. Try to full your bag and storage box with expensive jewellery, mobiles laptops and other expensive stuff. You can always drop items from your bag.

Tip No. 2 - Don't murder anyone inside the house. Otherwise secret agencies will be after you.
